sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function GameDetails() { let { gameId } = useParams(); let [gameObject, setGame] = useState({}); async function getGamedeatails(id) { let { data } = await axios.get(`https://free-to-play-games-database.p.rapidapi.com/api/games?id=`+id+`?rapidapi-key=b52128808dmsh5826403ec30ac21p1b9548jsnfca5769e0b68`); console.log(data); setGame(data); } useEffect(() => { getGamedeatails(gameId); }, []) return (
FREE
PLAY NOW

{gameObject.title}

About {gameObject.title}

{gameObject.description}

Minimum System Requirements

graphics : {gameObject.graphics}

memory : {gameObject.memory}

os : {gameObject.os}

processor : {gameObject.processor}

storage : {gameObject.storage}

Genshin Impact Screenshots

Additional Information

Title

{gameObject.title}

Developer

{gameObject.developer}

Publisher

{gameObject.publisher}

Release Date

{gameObject.release_date}

Genre

{gameObject.genre}

Platform

{gameObject.platform}

); }
